div.span: skip to main | skip to sidebar

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: right; " + "min-height: " + data:height + "px;" + "_height: " + data:height + "px;" + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "
"background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: left; " + "min-height: " + data:height + "px;" + "_height: " + data:height + "px;" + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "
